subject: Can you return a call?
body:
Do you have a telephone and can return calls?

If so call me now at 8OO.679.O1O8 to hear my message.

You can generate a great lncome for simply returning phone calls.

I know it sounds to good to be tru but this is not a joke.

Call 8OO.679.O1O8

I look forward to hearing from you

Later




Or you may no want this so simply reply back and let me know
